chapter.title: Uninstalling
chapter.para: If you wish to remove &THIS.PLATFORM; &THIS.APPLICATION; you can do so by deleting the installation directory. If you installed it as a JBoss Service then you must remember to clean up the SS7 Service files within the JBoss directory by undeploying the service as shown below. The procedure below can be ignored if you installed the Stack as a standalone component.

step.para:
